values: The Blinding Effects of Serving GodThe Blinding Effects of Serving God

It dishonors God to treat him as a master in need of slave labor. What
      honors God is not slave labor, but childlike faith in his
      all-sufficiency.
      It dishonors God to treat him as a master in need of slave labor. What
    honors God is not slave labor, but childlike faith in his
    all-sufficiency.
